newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Hi Cement,Davao Union set cash div.
newsitem.headline: Hi Cement,Davao Union set cash div.

text.p: The Philippines' Hi Cement Corp and Davao Union Cement Corp each approved a five centavo per share cash dividend to stockholders, the companies said on Friday.
In separate notices, the companies said the dividends will be payable on July 24.
Both cement firms also set similar record dates on July 3. Ex-cash date of the two firms is scheduled on July 3.
Both Davao Union and Hi-Cement are subsidiaries of Bacnotan Consolidated Industries Inc. Bacnotan is the flagship company of the Phinma Group.
